snippet: University of California students will have to be vaccinated against measles and other diseases under rules that take effect in 2017.
abstract: University of California officials announce that in 2017 all students must be vaccinated against measles and other diseases.
lead_paragraph: University of California students will have to be vaccinated against measles and other diseases under rules that take effect in 2017.

headline.main: California: Colleges to Require Measles Vaccinations
headline.print_headline: California: Colleges to Require Measles Vaccinations
